players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob is the mafia. He killed Alice. Vote him out."
You: "I didn't kill Alice. I think Charlie is the mafia."
Diana: "I think Charlie might be the mafia. Bob says he didn’t kill Alice but points at Charlie. Let’s vote Bob."
You: "I think Charlie is mafia, but I'm also suspicious of Diana."
Charlie: "Bob killed Alice, knows I'm detective, yet denies it and blames Charlie. That's classic mafia deflection. Vote Bob."
Diana: "I think Charlie is the detective. Bob’s claims don’t add up; he’s the only one accusing someone else while pointing at Diana. Vote Bob."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie

Diana: "I think Charlie is the detective. Bob’s claims don’t add up; he’s the only one accusing someone else while pointing at Diana. Vote Bob."
